property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts that shield into their graveyard instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Shield Force(When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your shields. While the chosen shield remains in the shield zone, this creature gets the following abilities)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Race
property.value: Demon Command/Shinobi

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ninja Strike 7(Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks or blocks, if you have 7 or more cards in your mana zone and if during that attack you didn't use a 'Ninja Strike' ability, you may summon this Shinobi for no cost. At the end of that turn, put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck) When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -6000 power until the end of the turn. When this creature would be destroyed and you have at least one darkness card in your mana zone, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard instead.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped) Choose a non-evolution creature in the battle zone and add it to its owner's shields face down.

property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts that shield into their graveyard instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped) ​ Shield trigger(When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost) Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures. Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped) ​ Shield trigger(When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost) Choose one of the following. If you have a creature that has 'Bolmeteus' in its name in the battle zone, you may choose both.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped) ​ Shield trigger(When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost) Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone that has power 6000 or more and return it to its owner's hand. Then, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped) Draw 2 cards. Then you may put a 'Bolmeteus Steel Dragon' from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: No Rarity

property.name: Race
property.value: Mecha Del Sol/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Blocker(Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle) This creature can't attack players. When this creature would leave the battle zone, if this creature has more than 0 power, it stays in the battle zone instead.

card.name: Chief De Baula, Machine King of Mystic Light

property.name: Race
property.value: Great Mecha King/Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Blocker(Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle) This creature can't attack players. When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return a spell from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Shield trigger(When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost) If there are 6 or more creatures in the battle zone, destroy all of them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Shield trigger(When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost) Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. If you have 2 or less shields, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Race
property.value: Earth Eater

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Blocker(Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle) This creature can't attack. At the start of your turn, return one of your creatures in the battle zone to their owner's hand. Then, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Shield trigger(When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost) Search your deck. You may take a card from your deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a card is put from a player's deck into a zone other than the hand, that player shuffles that card into their deck instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your opponent's cards are put into their mana zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy 2 of your creatures. Then your opponent chooses one of his creatures and destroys it.

card.name: The Grave of Angels and Demons

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped) ​ Shield trigger(When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost) If there are 2 or more creatures that have the same name in the battle zone, destroy all of them. Then look at each player's mana zone. If there are 2 or more cards that have the same name, put all of them into their owner's graveyards.

property.name: Race
property.value: Oracle/Great Mecha King

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Shield trigger(When this Card Type is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may use it for no cost) ​ Blocker(Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle) This creature can't attack. When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a player. That player puts his graveyard into their deck and shuffles it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy one of your opponent's creatures. Your opponent discards 2 cards from their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Shield trigger(When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it for no cost) When you put this creature or a creature that costs 7 or more into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) ​ Blocker(Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle) This creature can't attack players. Whenever your opponent would choose a creature by a spell effect, they can't choose this one. Whenever a card is discarded by one of your opponent's spell effect or creature ability, you may return up to 2 cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped) Choose one of your opponent's non-evolution creatures in the battle zone and return it to his hand. Then he discards a card at random from his hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped) Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand. Then your opponent discards a card at random from their hand. If the discarded creature has the same name as the returned creature, choose one of your opponent's shields and put it into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ninja Strike 4(Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks or blocks, if you have 4 or more cards in your mana zone and if during that attack you didn't use a 'Ninja Strike' ability, you may summon this Shinobi for no cost. At the end of that turn, put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck) When you put this creature into the battle zone, one of your creatures gets 'blocker' until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Race
property.value: Light Bringer/Gladiator/Origin

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return a card from your mana zone to your hand. If you do, put a card from your hand into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card. Recycle (You may pay mana to cast this spell from your graveyard. After you cast, put this spell on the bottom of your deck)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Shield trigger(When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it for no cost) Choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Race
property.value: Death Puppet

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at your opponent's hand and discard a card from it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) When you put this creature into the battle zone, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. Then, discard a card at random from your opponent's hand.

property.name: Race
property.value: Great Mecha King/Initiate

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) ​ Blocker(Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may tap this creature to stop the attack. Then the 2 creatures battle) Your spells may each cost 1 less to cast. They can't cost less than 1.
